Camera line: Originally parallax, but reflex conversions frequently use Arri eyepiece accessories.

Fixed eyepiece on camera door; 6.5x magnified image. Interchangeable doors for pivoting or anamorphic viewfinders available. A periscope attachment accessory can also be used for odd angles, but will slightly crop the frame in the viewfinder.
Standard and anamorphic extension tubes; eyepiece rotates 90째 above and below level with continuous upright image.

Fixed angle and includes integrated anamorphic switch and contrast viewing filters (ND .6 and .9). Short, medium and long eyepieces; all can be heated and have manual iris. Medium and long eyepieces include extra magnifier switch.
Standard and anamorphic extension tubes; eyepiece rotates 90째 above and below level with continuous upright image.

Rotates 360째 vertically with continuously upright image and includes integrated anamorphic switch and contrast viewing filters (ND .6 and .9). Short, medium and long eyepieces; all can be heated and have manual iris. Medium and long eyepieces include extra magnifier switch.
Standard and anamorphic extension tubes; eyepiece rotates 90째 above and below level with continuous upright image.
6.5x magnified image; doors can be changed between fixed eyepiece, 210째 rotating eyepiece, and offset eyepiece.

Spherical and anamorphic short eyepieces, spherical long eyepiece, and long eyepiece with anamorphic switch. Orientable viewfinder block also allows rotation from left to right of and extension away from the camera, but standard viewfinder does not. Both can rotate 360째 vertically, offer continuous upright image, and include an integrated contrast viewing filter (ND .6), heated eyepiece, and manual iris. 6.1x magnification, with 2.4x zoom available on long eyepieces.

Super Wide Angle eyepiece with 6.5x magnification and manual iris. Standard and anamorphic extension tubes, as well as a longer standard tube with switchable contrast viewing filter and 2x zoom; eyepiece rotates 90째 above and below level with continuous upright image. Bigger exit pupil for brighter image than older BL models.
